== GHDL ==

=== Installation ===
1. Download latest from https://github.com/ghdl/ghdl/releases/tag/nightly
2. Install stow `sudo apt install stow`
3. Extract downloaded to /usr/local/stow
   {{{
       tar -zxf ~/Downloads/ghdl-gha-ubuntu-20.04-mcode.tgz -C /usr/local/stow/ghdl
   }}}
4. Install using stow `cd /usr/local/stow; stow -d ghdl`
